name: BIOPAMA RRIS GeoNode Catalogue
description: A spatial data infrastructure focusing on themes related to biodiversity and protected areas, with a catalogue concentrating on the status and threats of natural resources in the ACP (African, Caribbean, Pacific) countries, and featuring many global data layers on these topics. Users can upload, discover, and use geospatial data and maps, and access various resources such as datasets, maps, dashboards, and geostories.
owner_name: BIOPAMA (Biodiversity and Protected Areas Management Programme)
